Игра - классика, но мне не пришлась по вкусу. Стрельба неудобная, дизайн уровней в некоторых местах сильно путает, физика транспорта не чувствуется правильной со всей её "прыгучестью" и кривой инерцией.
Its HalfLife... You need to play it...
Jogo com jogabilidade bem fluída, a história então nem se fala, muito boa. Pra mim é a melhor franquia.

【JOCUL】-Ba deci este absolut genial,merita jucat.
【GRAFICA】-Wa ii frumi dar imi place.
【CONTROALE】-Cum dreq sa sar wee.

【NOTA】-10/10
W1zard✅
How would I not suggest people to play Half-Life 2? It's the sequel to one of my favourite games. Not only that, but it's quite likely a masterpiece of design.

So, how to sum up this experience (not a game, EXPERIENCE, because that is what HL2 is, an experience).
It is long, around 12 hours which is definetely worth the price in my opinion. Gameplay is great and the story and lore are both awesome. Sometimes I dislike the music placement, but if you turn it down (which is by default), then it is not causing any problems whatsoever (and also there are some amazing pieces, like triage at dawn, hazardous enviroments and dark energy).
But the main reason that I like this series is the atmosphere. The dark, dystopian world of combine invaded planet. Every location has its own feel and it is the reason I like to come back and experience it again.

Rating: 9.5/10
Should I buy it: Absolutely, it is a very small price to pay for what you get and I would recommend this game to anyone.
Классная игра сюжет хороший игра потянет на слабом пк,самая лучшая игра valve

Впервые прошел эту игру только сейчас. Поэтому мнение будет объективным:
Игра вышла в 2004 году и сейчас она смотрится прекрасно .отличный сюжет и интересный геймплей. Игра реально понравилась ,теперь буду проходить эпизоды. 
На сколько я знаю до конца доходят только 27% игроков и это очень зря, игру рекомендую!

Bu oyun sadece insanların çocukluğunun oyunu diye efsane değil. Bu oyun görüp görebileceğiniz en iyi oyun evrenine, beta halinde olduğunda çalınmasaydı daha da büyük olacaktı, sahip ve gerçekten baştan sonra half life 2 ep1 ep2 şeklinde bitirince etkisinden çıkamıyorsunuz. Bu oyun oynamadıysanız ve hikaye sever bir oyuncuysanız, şansınız yok alın çabuk. İndirim dönemlerinde orange box paketi 5-6 liraya düşüyor.
Игра прикольная, здесь нужно думать логически, попотеть и размышлять. Кто любит головоломки с экшеном и  умеренное использование фантастики- я посоветую именно вам

Игра очень крутая, но также и сложная.Но думаю для любителей халвы это не страшно.Сюжет очень интересный и захватывающий, очень интересно выполнять достижения, а также очень много пасхалок. Вообщем игра топ и всем советую 12/10
como assim um motivo pra jogar half-life é half-life porra.

In 2020 there is some fun to be had in this game, but not much. It isn't bad, but I wouldn't recommend buying it unless you want to use it for gmod. That being said, its a 2004 game, I can't downvote it just for being old
Eski bir oyun fakat çok kaliteli.  Bir güç ile savaşmak , o güçle baş etmek onu alt etmek bunu çok güzel hissettiriyor.
Я бы хотел написать подробнее про эту игру,но без Лазло,какой смысл?
прекрасная легендарная игра half life 2. перепрохожу её уже во второй раз. нравится больше первой. сюжет понятен и прост.
Nie mogę uwierzyć że ta gra ma 16 lat. 10/10

indirimden half life 2 + Half-Life 2: Episode Two +Half-Life 2: Episode One 3 oyunu 12 TL gibi bi fiyata aldım 1 gün civarında bitirdim zamanında oynayamadığım için üzülüyordum oyun şuan bile gayet güzel grafikleri iş görür halde hikayesi akıcı bölümler yeterli zorlukta sıkmadan oynayabilirsiniz indirimdeyken kaçırmamanızı öneririrm
神作，十几年前的游戏放到现在也很能打

Скучное и унылое говно! Не понимаю людей, которые кричат что это шедевр!!! Кто-то скажет что она была шедевром для своего времени, а я скажу что эта игра и в свое время была унылым говном... В то время были игры куда интересней чем халва 2 не смотря на "крутую типа физику" Даже первая часть с её квадратами, и ощущением какой-то пустоты куда интересней чем вторая часть. -_-) И еще эта бесячая алекс, как она меня достала во время прохождения, лучше бы ее вообще не было! >_<

Half-life 2 was released in 2004 but I got my chance to play this game in 2020, This game blew my mind. What a game! 
Half-life 2 does not have the greatest combat mechanics but the usage of physics to design levels and create combat scenarios is brilliant.
The gravity gun is HOLY FUCKING SHIT fantastic. 
This game is a masterclass in puzzle and level design. Ravenholm is the perfect horror level. 16 years after its release, Ravenholm still remains one of the greatest horror experiences ever in a video game.
It's a shame that Valve did not continue the story after episode 3. 
C'mon Valve please give us that one last adventure for Gordon Freeman!
Ótimo jogo muito bom se você comprar não vai se arrepender

Oyun 1. oyundan sonra geçiyor grafikleri 2020 yılı içersinde kabul edilebilir seviyede vuruş hissi ortalama hikaye iyi fizik motoru günümüz içersindede baya iyi indirimde 3 tl ye düşüyor o fiyata cola almaktansa bunu alırdım  Puan 85/100 
- tempo biyerden sonra sıkıyor
офигеный сюжет самая крутая и офигеная игра не пожелел что купил все части
Eğer bu oyunu oynamadıysanız bilgisayarınızı boşuna almışsınızdır
Obra prima. Sem palavras. Possui alguns problemas com bugs e travamentos, mas ainda assim excelente.

7/10 -2020
8/10 -2005

-Squad AI (annoying by blocking player from behind in close quarters combat)
-getting stuck because of physic items under your feet
-sometimes uneven spikes in difficulty
-sometimes level design multiple reasons :
  hovercraft and buggy section is too long or bit too empty, underutilised (Game Flow)
  
  Sandtraps 
  (Dont step on the sand -> not bad idea but bit too long and annoying, physic glitching)
  
  Anticitizen One 
  (Hazard water road tunnel section, physic glitch or unwanted long jump->unnecessary deaths)
  
  Follow Freeman 
  (Squad AI, unclear path or solution which led to getting stuck or unnecessary deaths) 

+City 17 feel
+Gravity gun
+Sound design
+Ravenholm
+character facial animations
+use of physic enabled items

-/+ Graphic (some places holding well even today (indoors, inner city17, ravenholm), in other places it kind of aged bad (mosly larger outdoors like highway 17), its not far cry

Some annoyances could have been patched (Squad AI getting me stuck from behind or getting in front of me while throwing granade or firing rocket, some scipted events could have been tweaked for better flow and not to kill unsuspecting player ) some other sections would need more deeper re-work.

Liked first half of the game more even with pacing issues, Follow freeman chapter was biggest offender to me with most visible annoyances but it was most intensive chapter.
very fun game and would recommend everyone to play it

I mean, I tried it, got up to water hazard. I just don't enjoy it, the levels aren't particularly confusing, nothing lke that. It's just weirdly unfun to play. Maybe it's the manhacks, being annoying as sin, where all I have is a pistol and a crowbar. Maybe it's the 1 damage spam from the CPUs, constantly janking my vision while not killing me. Maybe it's the sprint system and how generally unfun it is. I jsut don't like it man.

As someone who has had this game for years, and only just finished Half Life 2, Half Life 2: Episode One, and Half Life 2: Episode 2, I see why everyone wanted a third installment. This game is excellent, its characters are fun, the dialogue is interesting, and the combat is phenomenal. I'll be among those who are still waiting for Valve's Half Life: 3.

"The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world"
-Gman
Fantastic Story. Way before it's time considering it's a 2001 Game
One of the best games of my lifetime.
kill brain washed humans, very fun

standard triple A bloat. i shot things while holding W for an hour and a half (the whole time i didn't get below half health and could play without even looking at the ammo supply) then got to a vehicle section in first person, which i promptly played for about fifteen minutes then gave up. this game doesn't hold up anymore, why is it normally ten dollars?

I still remember when i saw the E3 trailer of Half-Life 2, still hyping my innerchild and give some sort of goosebumps. Unfortunately at that time, my pc is not strong enough to play it. For a month or couple of it, i went to my friend's house just to play it for several hours. For more than 20 kilometers journey it worth it and still have a blast when i play it on my PC several years later. Thanks for making this game Valve. Half-Life 2 is special.
Absolute masterpiece, in every sense of the word.

Wow.
Pour un jeu de 2004 franchement c'est ouf.
Les graphismes ca passe vraiment bien et la physique, pour cette époque, est pas degeuse.
Le fait que le jeu se passe en une seule traite (il n'y a aucune cinématique) nous plonge à fond dedans et ça c'est cool (il y a quand même les micros temps de chargement de 2 secondes.)
À noter cependant certaines parties du jeu ne sont très intéressantes et ,parfois, sont un peu longue (mission avec le bateau).
Mais je recommande fort !

Крутая игра. Я говорю это не от настольгии, а от реально крутой игры. 
Сюжет, физика, графика(7/10 на 2020). Я всем советую поиграть в халф-лайф 2.
puedes partir zombies por la mitad 10/10
